column2: The character has found a piece of the Holy cross.

The character has found a piece of the Holy cross during his efforts to conquer the Holy Land from infidel hands, apparently a piece one of the three originals from the crucifixion of our Lord and Saviour.
The character has found an original relic of one of the Apostles.
The character has found an original relic of one of the Apostles during his last fight to reconquer the Holy Land.
Managing a Kingdom is hard indeed, and the needed bureaucracy will never be as effective as the one of small realms.
Managing an empire is very hard indeed, and the needed bureaucracy will never be as effective as the one of small realms or even smaller kingdoms.
A jewish community is present in this province.
This province is affected by the Charter of the Forest.
The Exchequer of Pleas is estabilished in the Kingdom of England
The Court of Common Pleas is estabilished in the Kingdom of England
The Magna Carta Libertatum was issued in the Kingdom of England
This character is respecting and benefiting from the "Sicut Judaeis" papal bull.
A Synagogue able to welcome all the realm's Jews was built in this province.
The Exchequer of the Jews is estabilished in the Kingdom of England
This character has recently made a Royal Entry in its realm's capital, and is now regarded with the greatest respect and honour.
This ruler has benefitted from Leonardo Fibonacci.
This ruler has benefitted from William of Moerbeke .
The Imperial Diet is estabilished in the Holy Roman Empire.
This province has been recently looted.
The Cortes Generales is estabilished in this Spanish Kingdom.
The Estates of Parliament is estabilished in the Kingdom of Alba.
This character is respecting the "Libertas Ecclesiae" papal bull.
This ruler rejected the fundamental notions of the "Libertas Ecclesiae" papal bull.
The Estates General is estabilished in the Kingdom of France.
This character is respecting the "Ad Extirpanda" papal bull.
This ruler rejected the fundamental notions of the "Ad Extirpanda" papal bull.
This character is respecting the "Ad Abolendam" papal bull.
This ruler rejected the fundamental notions of the "Ad Abolendam" papal bull.
The Sabor is estabilished in the Kingdom of Croatia.
This character is respecting the "Unam Sanctam" papal bull.
This ruler rejected the fundamental notions of the "Unam Sanctam" papal bull.
Reigning in a province that does not follow the true faith makes adminstration of your territories difficult.
Reigning in a province that does not follow the true faith makes adminstration of your territories difficult.
Being on a Crusade allows us to call on more troops from our vassals.
As we are fighting a defensive war, our vassals are obligated to provide us with more troops than they otherwise would.
This character presumes to decide over the affairs of the church despite being a temporal ruler. This attitude could be seen as borderline heretical.
The Eastern Roman Empire is not as strong as it used to be, and with the Muslim pressure on the east it is more and more likely to collapse sometimes soon.
The Seljuks are stronger than ever, pressuring Byzantium while consolidating their rule over their recently conquered lands in the Middle East.
This character's realm is struggling with the consequences of the Great Famine of 1315-1317
This province has been struck by a famine, people are dying out and even the soldiers cannot be properly fed.
This ruler is currently defending the Status Quo of his realm against treasonous vassals.
It is said that there is a wandering Dragon in some northern province of this character's realm.
A mighty Dragon is allegedly reported to be raging in some northern province of this character's realm.
It is said that this character defeated a mighty Dragon with the help of an army of Holy men! No one knows for sure whether it's true, or it's just royal propaganda.
It is said that this character defeated a mighty Dragon poisoning it with the smartest of tricks! No one knows for sure whether it's true, or it's just royal propaganda.
It is said that this character defeated a mighty Dragon during an epic fight! No one knows for sure whether it's true, or it's just royal propaganda.
The local Jewish community is enjoying a tax break granted by this province's liege.
The Siete Partidas is estabilished in the kingdom of Castille.
The Statute of Merton is estabilished in the kingdom of England.
A loan will be due for repayment at the expiration date of this modifier.
This character has estabilished the Ius Primae Noctis in the realm.

This character's wife recently sided with my fellow vassals asking me to lower what the call an "oppressive taxation". Rumors are that she rode naked all the way from the castle to the city well in order to persuade him.
A Wild Hunt has been recently sighted in many provinces of this character's realm. The peasants live in fear, and some churchmen claim the end of the world is approaching...
A Pogrom against the local Jewish Community is currently taking place in this province!
Quia Emptores is estabilished in the kingdom of England.
The Wandering Jew has been recently sighted in the outskirts of this character's dominion. The peasants are afraid, and some Holy men claim this is a bad omen for the realm.
This character is currently sponsoring and attending the Jubilee that his Holyness the Pope called for this year.
This character decided not to sponsor nor to attend the Jubilee that his Holyness the Pope called for this year.
This character is currently sponsoring the Crusade that his Holyness the Pope recently called.
This character decided not to sponsor the Crusade that his Holyness the Pope recently called.
This character is currently sponsoring the Jihad recently called by the Caliph.
This character decided not to sponsor the Jihad recently called by the Caliph.
Managing a large Duchy is hard indeed, and the needed bureaucracy will never be as effective as the one of small realms.
Being a Pope brings lots of benefits, but the money owed from the various bishops around the Catholic world is hard to collect..
This character's army recently won a battle who could reveal itself to be fundamental for the outcome of the whole war.
This character's army recently lost a battle who could reveal itself to be fundamental for the outcome of the whole war.
This character is currently holding a Great Ball at court.
This ruler is seen by others as weak and ineffective.
This ruler is seen by others as strong and competent.
This ruler holds all the lands derived from his titles, and doesn't like to delegate.
This ruler is a master in intriguing and plotting.
This character's realm is being torn by the current war.
This ruler is an inept in the fine art of politics.
This ruler's stewardship's skills are so laughable he can't even start to fight corruption.
This ruler is a master in administrating his realm, and everything runs as smoothly as ever.
This ruler isn't pious at all, preferring science and progress to the sure answers religion could offer him.
This ruler is a pious character who despises science and progress and prefers to find the answers to life's greatest dilemmas in the Holy Scriptures.
This ruler is one of it's time's greatest cultural and intellectual minds.
This ruler is uneducated and ignorant about most of the things that happen even just outside the castle's great hall.
This ruler's virtues and great deeds are renowned and admired throughout all the known world.
This ruler's lack of virtues or great deeds is disdained and despised throughout all the known world.
This ruler is wealthy and has no problems paying or paying back any gold spent.
A knight has refused to let this character squire for him
Your Personal Guard is performing a task
Your Personal Guard is drilling its soldiers

The province is experiencing decreased agricultural production, the abandonment of land, and the degeneration of cities. People are very pessimistic about their future and the average wage is falling rapidly.
The province is experiencing decreased agricultural production and the abandonment of land. People are generally pessimistic about their future and the average wage is falling.
The province is experiencing increased agricultural production and the clearing of land. People are generally optimistic about their future and the average wage is rising.

The province is experiencing increased agricultural production, the clearing of land, and major investments in production of goods. People are very optimistic about their future and the average wage is rising rapidly.
This blank slot is here to fix a crash bug. Ignore it and it will go away.

This Casus Belli can be used by §Y$PRESSER$§! to press §Y$CLAIMANT$'s§! claim on the §Y$TITLE$§!.

§Y$CLAIMANT$§! will become your vassal if one of the following conditions are true:
- §Y$PRESSER$§! and §Y$CLAIMANT$§! are of the same dynasty.
- The current holder of §Y$TITLE$§! is in the same realm as §Y$PRESSER$§!.
- §Y$TITLE$§! is a lower rank than §Y$CLAIMANT$§!'s primary title.
- §Y$PRESSER$§! is de jure liege of §Y$TITLE$§!.
Prestige is a faint fire which needs constant care and fueling to keep shining bright..
Prestige is a faint fire which needs constant care and fueling to keep shining bright..

The merchants in the province are struggling between their various allegiances to any of the merchant republics, making trade a tiresome and dangerous practice around here.

column3: Vous vous êtes une fois montré ivre à un tournoi, ce fut un spectacle si honteux que vous en avez été mis à la porte.

column2: Our relatively low rank gives us better control over our local vassals, who will supply us with more troops.
column3: Notre rang relativement modeste nous octroie un meilleur contrôle sur nos vassaux locaux, qui vont nous fournir plus de troupes.
column4: Unser relativ niedriger Stand gibt uns eine bessere Kontrolle über unsere lokalen Vasallen, die uns mit mehr Truppen versorgen werden.

column2: As we are fighting a defensive war, our vassals are obligated to provide us with more troops than they otherwise would.
column3: Comme nous nous battons dans une guerre défensive, nos vassaux sont obligés de nous fournir plus de troupes qu'à l'accoutumé.
column4: Da wir mit einem Verteidigungskrieg kämpfen, werden unsere Vasallen verpflichtet, uns mit mehr Truppen zu versorgen, als sie sonst würden.

Due to high taxes or some other slight on the small-holders, the peasantry are up in arms against your rule.
This character believes he is the son of Odin!
This character believes he is the son of Odin! And so does others!
This character believes he is the son of Loke!
This character believes he is the son of Loke!  And so do others!

As long as you're tough enough to be on top, why should your vassals care?
People still wonder if something is wrong with you…
Drink, love and be merry, for Ragnarok awaits!
Who could think there's anything wrong with lust?
Don't expect to be considered holy just because you dislike sex
Drink and be merry, for Ragnarok awaits!
It is fine to be fine at your lot in life. But don't expect anyone to think Odin likes you more for it
Courage and bravery in battle is the road to Valhalla!

column2: The province is experiencing decreased agricultural production, the abandonment of land, and the degeneration of cities. People are very pessimistic about their future and the average wage is falling rapidly.
column3: La province connaît une diminution de la production agricole, provoqué par l'abandon des terres et la dégénérescence des villes. Les gens sont très pessimistes quant à leur avenir et le salaire moyen est en baisse rapide.
column4: Der Provinz erfährt verringerte Agrarproduktion, die Landflucht, und die Degeneration der Städte. Die Leute sind sehr pessimistisch über ihre Zukunft und der Durchschnittslohn fält rasch

column2: The province is experiencing decreased agricultural production and the abandonment of land. People are generally pessimistic about their future and the average wage is falling.
column3: La province connaît une diminution de la production agricole et l'abandon des terres. Les gens sont généralement pessimistes sur leur avenir et le salaire moyen est en baisse.
column4: Der Provinz erfährt verringerte Agrarproduktion und die Landflucht. Die Menschen sind in der Regel pessimistisch über ihre Zukunft und der Durchschnittslohn sinkt.

column2: The province is experiencing increased agricultural production and the clearing of land. People are generally optimistic about their future and the average wage is rising.
column3: La province connaît une production agricole accrue et un défrichage de ses terres. Les gens sont généralement optimistes quant à leur avenir et le salaire moyen est en hausse.
column4: Der Provinz erfährt erhöhte Agrarproduktion und die Rodung des Landes. Die Menschen sind insgesamt optimistisch über ihre Zukunft und der Durchschnittslohn steigt.

column2: The province is experiencing increased agricultural production, the clearing of land, and major investments in production of goods. People are very optimistic about their future and the average wage is rising rapidly.
column3: La province connaît une production agricole accrue, le défrichage de ses terres, et d'importants investissements dans la production de biens. Les gens sont très optimistes quant à leur avenir et le salaire moyen augmente rapidement.
column4: Der Provinz erfährt erhöhte Agrarproduktion, die Rodung von Land und große Investitionen in die Produktion von Gütern. Die Leute sind sehr optimistisch um ihre Zukunft und der Durchschnittslohn steigt rasant.
